input_text:
Job Title: NetSuite Developer - Ecommerce

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
ACS Ecommerce Services is looking for a Sr. NetSuite Developer to provide clients with NetSuite customizations and enhancements. This is an excellent opportunity to become part of a highly dynamic and constantly growing multicultural environment team. If you're ready to thrive in an environment that values innovation, collaboration, and passion for technology, then we welcome you to join us on this exciting journey!
The Sr. Web Developer in NetSuite is responsible primarily for providing and leading consulting and development services to Advance Customer Services clients. This role is expected to:Work with JavaScript to build custom solutions for significant ecommerce clients and create reusable components with JavaScript.Meet deadlines and creatively solve problems.Work closely with Project Managers and other members of the Development Team to both develop detailed specification documents with clear project deliverables and timelines, and to ensure timely completion of work.Attend client meetings during development when needed.Communicate with efficiency and accuracy any progress and/or delaysTranslates requirements documentation and graphic design into a functional NetSuite Ecommerce website.Document and validate customer’s technical requirements and map to NetSuite functionality.Develops standard methodologies, features and product extensions.Be a “go-to” resource for specific technical areas.Work with other other groups on features/solutions.Assist with limited scoping and estimation.Support the Sales cycle through scoping and estimation of ACS engagementsContribute to the solutions repository/standard methodologies, knowledge share activitiesConduct Internal trainings on Domain Expertise to filter out standard methodologies Qualifications:Superb communication on both technical and non-technical contexts is required as well as working under deadlines in a fast-paced development environment and prioritizing competing demands. Looking for you to take initiative, take responsibility and ownership of your projects.Establish credibility and rapport with internal and external stakeholdersAbility to influence customers to modify current business practices, as requiredWorks fairly independently with some guidance and direction on workAbility to complete assignments and tasks delegated by other project resourcesAbility to work in a deadline-focused environment, consistently producing work within agreed upon timeframesAbility to manage multiple project commitments simultaneouslyPrioritize tasks, manages time well and handles information flow.Comfortable with translating customer business requirements into workable technical solutions within defined areas of expertiseDesign and Develop innovative solutions to solve custom customer business requirements.Be fully versed on functionality released with each new product upgradeDemonstrates good judgement in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining technical solutionsUse existing methods and standard methodologies to develop NetSuite ecommerce web site, new features and extensions with the highest levels of security, reliability, efficiency, performance and scalability Required:Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a Technical area or equivalent educational background.Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in developing websites, demonstrating proficiency in both front-end and back-end development. Experience:Experience in web technologies/standards (HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript).Experience with JavaScript MVC frameworks, AJAX and JSON structure.SuiteScript experience, developing back-end customization.Experience working with RESTFUL APIs.Solid understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies.Experience working on SuiteCommerce customizations.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: NetSuite Developer - Ecommerce
output_json.summary: Sr. NetSuite Developer position at ACS Ecommerce Services.
job_responsibilities: Building custom solutions for ecommerce clients using JavaScript
Working with Project Managers and Development Team
Translating requirements into functional NetSuite Ecommerce website
Documenting and validating customer technical requirements
Developing standard methodologies, features, and product extensions
Contributing to solutions repository and knowledge share activities
Conducting internal trainings on domain expertise

other.content: Superb communication on both technical and non-technical contexts, working under deadlines, prioritizing competing demands, taking initiative, taking responsibility, establishing credibility and rapport with stakeholders, working independently, managing time well, handling information flow, good judgement in selecting methods and techniques, translating business requirements into technical solutions, being fully versed on product upgrades, demonstrating security, reliability, efficiency, performance, and scalability.
